Package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.util

Class EventFileReader

java.lang.Object
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.SimEntity
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server.ServerUser
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server.ReservationServerUser
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.util.EventFileReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventSink<SimEvent>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SwfWorkloadReader
public abstract class EventFileReader extends ReservationServerUser
This class implements the basic functionality for an entity that loads event information from a file. This reader loads a file, and calls hooks that define the basic behaviour for the parsed information (e.g. doLineProcessing(int, String[])).
Author:
Marcos Dias de Assuncao

  • Constructor Details

    • EventFileReader

      public EventFileReader(String name, String eventFileName, String delim) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new event file reader.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the entity
      eventFileName - the file that contains the event information
      delim - the field delimiter, default is "\\s+"
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null or has size 0.

    • EventFileReader

      public EventFileReader(String name, String eventFileName) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new event file reader.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the entity
      eventFileName - the file that contains the event information
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null or has size 0.

  • Method Details

    • onStart

      public void onStart()
      This method is invoked by the Simulation when the simulation starts.
      Overrides:
      onStart in class ServerUser

    • doLineProcessing

      public abstract boolean doLineProcessing(int lineNum, String[] fields)
      Processes a line read from the event file.
      Parameters:
      lineNum - the data line in the file
      fields - the list of fields read from the file
      Returns:
      true if the processing was successful; false otherwise.

    • doFinalProcessing

      public abstract void doFinalProcessing()
      Method invoked after the whole event file has been read. It can be used by subclasses to do some final processing.
